Name: The Beauty Beneath
Ingredients: 60 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
30 ml Mancino Vermouth di Torino Chinato
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Rum-forward with zesty orange and bittersweet herbal notes.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2008 by Jeffrey Morgenthaler at Bel Ami Lounge in Eugene, Oregon and featured on his jeffreymorgenthaler.com . Jeff's original recipe calls for Appleton Estate Signature Blend rum and Vergano 'Americano' chinato.
